meanings.def: to prepare and use land for growing plants or crops
examples: The land around here has never been cultivated.
The land here has been intensively cultivated for generations.
The people cultivate mainly rice and beans.
Olives have been cultivated successfully in southern Australia.

meanings.def: to try to get somebody’s friendship or support
examples: He purposely tried to cultivate good relations with the press.
It helps if you go out of your way to cultivate the local people.

meanings.def: to develop an attitude, a way of talking or behaving, etc.
examples: She cultivated an air of sophistication.
This modern image is actively cultivated by the company.
